item.title: Blueprint - Android dashboard for icon packs
item.description: ðŸ’™ A beautiful iconpack App With Blueprint Android Dashboard. GitHub stars About Blueprint.ðŸ’Ž Blueprint Project is an open source code project on GitHub. In-app icon request tool Premium Icon Requests (Coming soon!) Support for Pacific Manager Apply section with 20 supported launchers. (Other launchers might not support direct apply) Help section, to answer the questions your users have.
